summary:
This was the second try for this pink cutie. 
First after 826 Jigglypuff combo (no Shiny Charm) and then catch one Chansey shiny...
caption:
This was the second try for this pink cutie.
First after 826 Jigglypuff combo (no Shiny Charm) and then catch one Chansey shiny 🤣 Second after 37 catch with Shiny Charm, not bad 😎

blog.name: thevideogameartarchive
blog.title: The Video Game Art Archive
blog.description:
The Video Game Art Archive is dedicated to scanning and extracting classic video game artwork at the best resolutions possible!

Support us on Patreon!
We update four times a day with new artwork from long forgotten games that have never had their art available. Looking for a specific game? Check out the Archive! You might get lucky!
Also follow our other blog: Want to help us continue our work? Help via PayPAL

blog.name: luigiyoshi2210
blog.title: Like my art? You must reconsider XD
blog.description: Super Mario // The Walking Dead Game // Sherlock // Supernatural // Zootopia// Detroit: Become Human // Jess Glynne // Bastille // Mumford & Sons// Gorillaz // Has too many fandoms but draws about two or three of them // Is trying to focus on the ones I have right now before I like something else // Likes throwing my precious bois into some fandoms and makes a lot of crossovers // Luigi and Yoshi are the best // Light-hearted but also dark, obsessed with gay and can force it on any character I wish (uhhh)

summary: Reggie Fils-Aimé se despide de Nintendo con emotivo mensaje.
title: Reggie Fils-Aimé se despide de Nintendo con emotivo mensaje.
body:
Reggie Fils-Aimé se despide de Nintendo con emotivo mensaje.

El día de ayer de manera sorpresiva, Reggie Fils-Aimé, Presidente de Nintendo de América, a través de un emotivo mensaje, anuncio su salida de la compañía japonesa, es así que casi después de 16 años de trabajar en La Gran N, este 15 de abril, Reggie dejará su puesto por motivos personales y familiares, siendo Doug Bowser quién tomará cargo del puesto.

Reggie Fils-Aimé se uniría a Nintendoen el…

View On WordPress

Reggie Fils-Aimé se uniría a Nintendoen el…
